description: A massive ship disguised as an island, commanded by Gecko Moria. It serves as the base for Moria's zombie army and his operations in the Florian Triangle.

keyEvents.title: Moria's Plan Revealed
keyEvents.description: Gecko Moria reveals his plan to become Pirate King by using Luffy's captured shadow and strength within his chambers on Thriller Bark.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the central conflict of the arc and reveals Moria's ultimate ambitions.

keyEvents.title: Brook's Dramatic Return
keyEvents.description: Brook returns to Thriller Bark and defeats Tararan with his Three-Verse Humming: Arrow Notch Slash, demonstrating his previous connection to the island.
keyEvents.significance: Brook's return to the island where his shadow was stolen five years ago marks a turning point in his storyline.

statusHistory.reason: Thriller Bark continues to operate as Moria's base

description: The central mansion on Thriller Bark where Gecko Moria resides and conducts his operations. Contains his personal chambers where he meets with captured prisoners.

keyEvents.title: Confrontation in Moria's Chambers
keyEvents.description: Luffy is brought to Moria's chambers where Moria reveals his plan to use Luffy's strength to become Pirate King.
keyEvents.significance: First direct confrontation between Luffy and Moria, establishing their opposing philosophies about power and ambition.
